headline: Apollo Global is one of the best names in private equity, says Explosive Options' Lang
summary: CNBC’s “Power Lunch” team discusses private equity and the case for Apollo Global with Bob Lang, founder and chief options analyst at Explosive Options.

raw.headline: Apollo Global is one of the best names in private equity, says Explosive Options' Lang
raw.summary: CNBC’s “Power Lunch” team discusses private equity and the case for Apollo Global with Bob Lang, founder and chief options analyst at Explosive Options.

headline: Blackstone Credit & Insurance Announces $1 Billion Forward Flow Origination Partnership with Harvest Commercial Capital
summary: NEW YORK, December 11, 2025--Today, Blackstone Credit & Insurance ("BXCI") announced a forward flow origination partnership with Harvest Commercial Capital, LLC ("Harvest"), a leader in small business lending, to acquire business loans secured by first lien mortgages on owner-occupied commercial real estate. Under the terms of the partnership, BXCI has purchased an initial portfolio of loans and established a forward flow program for a total of $1 billion in loans.
